parameters.name: DBClusterDescription
parameters.description: The description of the cluster. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: DBClusterIds
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. Separate multiple cluster IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DBClusterStatus
parameters.description: The state of the cluster that you want to query. For information about valid values, see [Cluster states](~~99286~~).

parameters.name: DBNodeIds
parameters.description: The ID of the node. You can specify multiple node IDs. Separate multiple node IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DBType
parameters.description:
The database engine that the cluster runs. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **Oracle**

parameters.name: DBVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version of the cluster.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the cluster has expired. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, or **100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

parameters.name: RecentCreationInterval
parameters.description: Filters clusters created in the last N days. Valid values: 0 to 15.

parameters.name: RecentExpirationInterval
parameters.description: Filters clusters that expire after N days. Valid values: 0 to 15.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query the available regions.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
